ygData.subject: RE: enchanter only robes
ygData.msgSnippet: At 09:13 AM 7/10/99 -0400, you wrote: It s available on a vendor just south of the bank in Qeynos. Called a flowing silk tunic I believe. It doesn t fit small
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:13 AM 7/10/99 -0400, you wrote:

It's available on a vendor just south of the bank in Qeynos. Called a
flowing silk tunic I believe. It doesn't fit small sizes so my Gnome never
got one but its for sale for about 3 plat. Just check all the vendors in
that tent area between the bank and the docks and look for a a silk
something or other.


>Yes I would like to know where its sold at. :)
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Wanderer CommonWealth [mailto:wanderercw@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 10:04 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] enchanter only robes
>
>
> ya know there is a robe out there that has +5 charisma which is very
>useful for enchanters more useful than a +2 mana. It's a tunic looks like
>you have nothing on you can buy it for about 2pp-3pp depends on your
>charisma. Send me an e-mail if oyu would like to know where it is.
>wanderercw@... The Wanderer --- "Farr, Robert" wrote: > From: "Farr,
>Robert" > > The stats are the same, it is just a robe unique to > our class.
>> > > -----Original Message----- > > From: Freedom
>[SMTP:sysgod@...] > > Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 7:45 PM > > To:
>eqenchanters@onelist.com > > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] enchanter only
>robes > > > > In Felwithe the robe is not enchanter only but the > jr and
>senior > > apprentice robes are no trade no drop and the > senior is 6 ac
>and +1mana > > what are the stats on the gold one. > > > > Sloop wrote: > >
>> > > Although I could by this point easily have an > FBR or something of
>the > > > sort, I stick with my Gold Senior Apprentice > robe, just because
>it's > > > enchanter only. Think of it as 'Enchanter > Pride'. I think that
>there > > > should be some decent enchanter only robes, > which of course
>would be > > > quest items, and no trade/ no drop, and lore. > This goes for
>the other > > > spellcasting classes as well.-Sloop > > > > -- > > > > Get
